title: Reserve Deputy Commander, U.S. Seventh Fleet calls on Commander of the Navy
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A U.S. Navy delegation headed by the Reserve Deputy Commander, U.S. Seventh Fleet, Rear Admiral Robert T. Clark called on Commander of the Navy, Vice Admiral Nishantha Ulugetenne at the Navy Headquarters today (21st March 2022).

The delegation has arrived in Sri Lanka to attend the 03rd edition of US – SL Navy Staff Talks. During this meeting, the Commander of the Navy and members of the U.S. Navy delegation exchanged views on several matters of bilateral importance.
The cordial discussion drew to a close with the presentation of mementos to the visiting delegation, marking the significance of this occasion.
Reserve Deputy Commander, U.S. Seventh Fleet calls on Commander of the Navy
Another senior citizen dies while waiting in line; 3rd such death in 72 hours
